Package persistence.character

Interface CharacterDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
APICharacterDAO, JSONCharacterDAO
public interface CharacterDAO
Interface that provides methods for retrieving and persisting character data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteCharacter(Character characterToDelete)
    Deletes a character from the persistence storage.
    List<String>
    getAllNames()
    Gets the names of all characters.
    String
    getCharacterNameByIndex(int index)
    Gets the name of a character at a specific index.
    List<Character>
    getCharactersByIndex(List<Integer> indexCharacters)
    Gets a list of characters based on their indices.
    List<Character>
    getPlayerCharacters(String playerName)
    Gets the player characters associated with a given player name.
    List<Character>
    readAll()
    Reads all characters from the persistence storage.

    Saves a character to the persistence storage.
    void
    saveCharacters(List<Character> characters)
    Saves a list of characters to the persistence storage.

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      List<Character> readAll() throws PersistenceException
      Reads all characters from the persistence storage.
      Returns:
      A list of all characters.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs during the read operation.

    • getAllNames

      List<String> getAllNames() throws PersistenceException
      Gets the names of all characters.
      Returns:
      A list of character names.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs during the read operation.

    • saveCharacter

      void saveCharacter(Character character) throws FileErrorException, UnknownCharacterClassException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Saves a character to the persistence storage.
      Parameters:
      character - The character to be saved.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs while saving the character.
      UnknownCharacterClassException - If the character class is unknown.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • getPlayerCharacters

      List<Character> getPlayerCharacters(String playerName) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Gets the player characters associated with a given player name.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player.
      Returns:
      A list of player characters.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs during the read operation.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • deleteCharacter

      void deleteCharacter(Character characterToDelete) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Deletes a character from the persistence storage.
      Parameters:
      characterToDelete - The character to delete.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs during the delete operation.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • getCharacterNameByIndex

      String getCharacterNameByIndex(int index) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Gets the name of a character at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the character.
      Returns:
      The name of the character.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs during the read operation.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • getCharactersByIndex

      List<Character> getCharactersByIndex(List<Integer> indexCharacters) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Gets a list of characters based on their indices.
      Parameters:
      indexCharacters - A list of indices of characters to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of characters.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs during the read operation.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • saveCharacters

      void saveCharacters(List<Character> characters) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Saves a list of characters to the persistence storage.
      Parameters:
      characters - The list of characters to be saved.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs during the save operation.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.
